title: Bob Currie (footballer)
text:
Robert Currie was a Scottish professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>, best remembered during his five years in the <a href="The%20Football%20League">Football League</a> with <a href="Bury%20F.C.">Bury</a>. He also played in the <a href="Scottish%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Heart%20of%20Midlothian%20F.C.">Heart of Midlothian</a>, <a href="Arthurlie%20F.C.">Arthurlie</a> and <a href="Morton%20F.C.">Morton</a>.
Personal life.
Currie's brothers <a href="Duncan%20Currie">Duncan</a> and <a href="Sam%20Currie">Sam</a> also became footballers.
Honours.
Heart of Midlothian
